TABLE.NAME: googlemeet
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the googlemeet activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance.

FIELD.NAME: originalname
FIELD.COMMENT: The original name of the activity module instance.

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL of room.

FIELD.NAME: creatoremail
FIELD.COMMENT: Email from the Google account that created the room.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: lastsync
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this activity was synced to Google Drive.

FIELD.NAME: eventdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The date of the event.

FIELD.NAME: starthour
FIELD.COMMENT: The start hour of the event.

FIELD.NAME: startminute
FIELD.COMMENT: The start minute of the event.

FIELD.NAME: endhour
FIELD.COMMENT: The end hour of the event.

FIELD.NAME: endminute
FIELD.COMMENT: The end minute of the event.

FIELD.NAME: addmultiply
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to add multiple events.

FIELD.NAME: days
FIELD.COMMENT: Days of the week.

FIELD.NAME: period
FIELD.COMMENT: The event period.

FIELD.NAME: eventenddate
FIELD.COMMENT: The event end date.

FIELD.NAME: notify
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to send notification to the student.

FIELD.NAME: minutesbefore
FIELD.COMMENT: When the notification should be send.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: eventid
FIELD.COMMENT: Google Calendar Event ID

FIELD.NAME: maxupcomingevents
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum number of upcoming events to display.

FIELD.NAME: eventdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The date of the event.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: The duration of the event.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

TABLE.NAME: googlemeet_recordings
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores references from Google Meet recordings.

FIELD.NAME: recordingid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the video in Google Drive.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the video.

FIELD.NAME: createdtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the video creation date.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Duration of the video.

FIELD.NAME: webviewlink
FIELD.COMMENT: Video preview link.

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: If the recording should be visible.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

TABLE.NAME: googlemeet_notify_done
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores references from Google Meet recordings.

FIELD.NAME: timesent
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the video creation date.

TABLE.NAME: googlemeet_holidays
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores holiday/exclusion periods for recurring events.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional name for the holiday period (e.g., Christmas).

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Start date of the exclusion period.

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: End date of the exclusion period.

TABLE.NAME: googlemeet_cancelled
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores cancelled dates for individual sessions.

FIELD.NAME: cancelleddate
FIELD.COMMENT: The specific date that is cancelled.

FIELD.NAME: reason
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional reason for cancellation.

FIELD.NAME: recordingid
FIELD.COMMENT: FK to googlemeet_recordings.

FIELD.NAME: summary
FIELD.COMMENT: AI-generated summary of the video.

FIELD.NAME: keypoints
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON array of key points extracted from the video.

FIELD.NAME: transcript
FIELD.COMMENT: Full transcript of the video.

FIELD.NAME: topics
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON array of topics discussed in the video.

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: Detected language of the video content.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Processing status: pending, processing, completed, failed.

FIELD.NAME: error
FIELD.COMMENT: Error message if processing failed.

FIELD.NAME: aimodel
FIELD.COMMENT: AI model used for analysis.
